name: Carrot Expanse
description:
I made this game in few days for the 34th Godot Wild Jam. I created all the assets and art during the jam period, with the exception being the font which I made for my previous game. 

Also there is no sound or music in this game, I did not get time to create/ learn to implement them in a way I felt good with. I may come back after the jam to update it with sound though.

Because I personally love knowing how long someone worked on a project, this game took me about 2-3 days of work. 

You control a space ship navigating its way through an asteroid field. Your goal is to last as long as possible and collect as many carrots as possible. As a last resort, you're able to use your carrots as projectiles to destroy any oncoming Asteroids, but be warned, this will lead to less carrots when you die and thus a lower score.

Score do not save between sessions. Refreshing the page/game will wipe the high score

Ratings and comments are greatly appreciated :)
